reviews.content: This version works on 12.4. latest version does not

iPad 5th gen, iPadOS 13.3.1 - App appears on home screen and launches. Attempting to choose an image crashes the app. The app does not show any local AirDrop targets when they do show up in the Photos app share sheet.
Working but with bugs on my iPad 7 on iOS 13.3.1
I’m not a troll, But this app is.
Sometimes won’t work unless you reboot phone
No app showed up after installing
Lags a bit after activating, but other than that it works fine.
